wikipedia_page.main: Jonathan Neil Mendelsohn, Baron Mendelsohn (born 30 December 1966) is a British lobbyist and Labour political organiser. He was appointed the Director of General Election Resources for the party in 2007.

link_mentions.page: List of barons in the peerages of Britain and Ireland

response: On 3 March 2021, 888 Holdings appointed Lord Jonathan Mendelsohn as Chairman.
